attributes.action: Call a general election as early as possible in the new year to allow the public to cast a verdict on the government record of mismanagement and give them the boot.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government has admitted to losing data on 25 million child benefit recipients, putting those people at risk of fraud. This information came less than only a day after it emerged that £25bn of taxpayers money loaned to Northern Rock might never be paid back. It's time the public were given the chance to cast a verdict on this incompetence and boot them out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
